about_the_game:
Control your small box with your own rhythm - it will be a different experience. ~

It Tells the Life Of Many Boxes.

Main Features


Players control the different boxes to jump at different heights to reach the level of the card and its own expectations.

Use the mouse to control the box jump and the keyboard to control the color of the box to complete the card.

There are many different modes of the game. Video mode maze mode and so on.

I play music in the background and follow the music to create your own rhythm map.

Metaphysical Little Box


This is a small game that lets the box jump by controlling the mouse or dragging the scroll bar.
It allows you to get your own dynamic desktop through the recording screen in conjunction with the Wallpaper Engine. /funny
It allows these small boxes to play custom videos and present their own images, as well as custom waves and more. Ps: Dynamic and full~
I play music in the background and follow the music to create my own rhythm map~

After a person develops in class, I hope that players can play these small boxes with pleasure and joy.

R/f Control Block Height

Wasd Control Angle Of View Rotation

Zoom In Or Out to Zoom In and Out

Press H to Reset the Hidden Ui.

The two empty spaces on the left of the start menu button are used to define the number of grids - length x width ~ ps: don't make a dead setting. Be careful with the computer taking off / funny

Enter your own video address in the viedo url to play it. and local D:\xxx\xxx.mp4 ////_// //
In the rest of the url position, you can enter the image address png format. The black-and-white image on the maze is better.

detailed_description:
Control your small box with your own rhythm - it will be a different experience. ~

It Tells the Life Of Many Boxes.

Main Features


Players control the different boxes to jump at different heights to reach the level of the card and its own expectations.

Use the mouse to control the box jump and the keyboard to control the color of the box to complete the card.

There are many different modes of the game. Video mode maze mode and so on.

I play music in the background and follow the music to create your own rhythm map.

Metaphysical Little Box


This is a small game that lets the box jump by controlling the mouse or dragging the scroll bar.
It allows you to get your own dynamic desktop through the recording screen in conjunction with the Wallpaper Engine. /funny
It allows these small boxes to play custom videos and present their own images, as well as custom waves and more. Ps: Dynamic and full~
I play music in the background and follow the music to create my own rhythm map~

After a person develops in class, I hope that players can play these small boxes with pleasure and joy.

R/f Control Block Height

Wasd Control Angle Of View Rotation

Zoom In Or Out to Zoom In and Out

Press H to Reset the Hidden Ui.

The two empty spaces on the left of the start menu button are used to define the number of grids - length x width ~ ps: don't make a dead setting. Be careful with the computer taking off / funny

Enter your own video address in the viedo url to play it. and local D:\xxx\xxx.mp4 ////_// //
In the rest of the url position, you can enter the image address png format. The black-and-white image on the maze is better.

name: BoxEngine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x64
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4 or AMD Athlon X2 @ 2.8 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB DirectX11（Shader Model 5）
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: normal
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: x64
  • Processor: Intel Core 4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4GB
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: normal

short_description: Control your little box with your own rhythm - it will be a different experience~
